product_name: Baffin Young Eiger Winter Boots - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Featuring a comfort rating down to -76degF to keep little toes cozy, these expedition-worthy Baffin Young Eiger winter boots are built to handle tough winter conditions. Rugged yet flexible, the synthetic leather and ripstop nylon uppers resist water and abrasion. 2 rip-and-stick adjustment straps ensure a snug fit around legs; easy single-pull cuff cords with cordlocks keep snow from getting in. Removable polyester liner system ensures moisture management, soft comfort and cozy warmth. Rubber midsoles insulate, cushion, absorb shock and reduce fatigue. Thermoplastic rubber outsoles on the Baffin Young Eiger boots remain flexible in cold temperatures; aggressive tread resists clogging and offers exceptional traction. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring a comfort rating down to -76degF to keep little toes cozy, these expedition-worthy Baffin Young Eiger winter boots are built to handle tough winter conditions.
